title: Transmission Request
description: The request sent from a Sender to a Receiver for sharing PAF data for a set of Addressable Content

source.description:
Signature based on input:
```
transmission_request_receiver_domain        + '\u2063' +
source.domain          + '\u2063' + 
source.timestamp       + '\u2063' +
seed.source.signature
```

parents.description: The list of Transmission Result before this Transmission Request for the given Seed.
